parameters.name: tpage
parameters.description: Page number to return, starting with 0.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of rows to return.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of items to return (partial match, no case). Omit for all items.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Item property used for sorting

parameters.name: orderstathash
parameters.description: This value is used when the order parameter is set to ItemStatHash. The item stat for the provided hash value will be used in the sort.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Order to sort items: Ascending or Descending

parameters.name: rarity
parameters.description: Rarity of items to return. Omit for all items.

parameters.name: step
parameters.description: Hash ID of the talent node step that an item must have in order to be returned.

parameters.name: weaponPerformance
parameters.description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

parameters.name: impactEffects
parameters.description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

parameters.name: guardianAttributes
parameters.description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

parameters.name: lightAbilities
parameters.description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

parameters.name: damageTypes
parameters.description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

parameters.name: matchrandomsteps
parameters.description: True if the supplied groups/step hash filters should match random node steps. False indicates the item can always get the step before it is considered a match.

parameters.name: definitions
parameters.description: Include definitions in the response. Use while testing.

parameters.name: sourcecat
parameters.description: Items must drop from the specified source category, omit for all items.

parameters.name: sourcehash
parameters.description: Items must drop from the specified source, omit for all items. Overrides sourcecat.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The current page to return. Starts at 1.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of rows to return.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of items to return (partial match, no case). Omit for all items.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Order to sort items: Ascending or Descending

parameters.name: weaponPerformance
parameters.description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

parameters.name: impactEffects
parameters.description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

parameters.name: guardianAttributes
parameters.description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

parameters.name: lightAbilities
parameters.description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

parameters.name: damageTypes
parameters.description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

parameters.description: A valid definitionId.

parameters.name: periodType
parameters.description: Indicates a specific period type to return. Optional.

parameters.name: modes
parameters.description: Filter by ActivityModeType.

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: Group of stats to include, otherwise only general stats are returned.

parameters.name: monthstart
parameters.description: First month to return when monthly stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM.

parameters.name: monthend
parameters.description: Last month to return when monthly stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM.

parameters.name: daystart
parameters.description: First day to return when daily stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: dayend
parameters.description: Last day to return when daily stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD
